command: wget https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/mysql/mysql-connector-java/5.1.43/mysql-connector-java-5.1.43.jar; wget https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/mysql/mysql-connector-java/5.1.43/mysql-connector-java-5.1.43.jar.md5; if [ $(md5sum /mysql-connector-java-5.1.43.jar | cut -d ' ' -f1) = $(cat /mysql-connector-java-5.1.43.jar.md5) ]; then echo success; else echo failed;exit 1;fi;mv /mysql-connector-java-5.1.43.jar /opt/shardingsphere-proxy/ext-lib
initContainers.name: download-mysql-jar
